uses: Use a fork as a makeshift hair accessory by sticking it in your bun or ponytail for a quirky and edgy look.
Create DIY plant markers by labeling them with a fork stuck in the soil next to your plants.
Use forks as unique and eye-catching wall hooks for hanging keys, jewelry, or other small items.
Use a fork as a guide for spacing out rows in your garden when planting seeds or plants.
Use a fork as a back scratcher for hard-to-reach itches.
Use a fork as a tool for painting abstract or textured designs on canvas or other surfaces.
Use forks as skewers for making creative and decorative fruit or cheese platters.
Use forks as poker chips for a makeshift game of poker or other card games.
Use forks as a tool for creating interesting patterns in clay or other sculpting materials.
Use forks as a tool for carving or etching designs in wood or other materials.
